result.execSummary:
The defendant Camila M Gomez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Conceal (<=$500) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: ***DEFT IS ORDERED TO PROVIDE A DNA SPECIMEN PRIOR BEING RELEASED FROM JAIL***

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Camila M Gomez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Per RASO - mandatory jail time has been served
Status conference on October 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 3, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with victim store, Piggly Wiggley, except for restitution purposes.   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Camila M Gomez in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Defendant Camila M Gomez in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 3, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for October 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
